definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan
Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2
Shang4 hai3 Jiao1 tong1 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: The Browns are all college graduates.
sentences.chinese: 布朗一家人都是大學畢業生。

sentences.english: All non-Nepalese students enrolled at any of Hong Kong's universities are eligible to participate in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 所有非尼泊爾裔香港註冊大學學生均可參加。

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Psychology, Memorial University of Newfoundland .
sentences.chinese: 這是紐芬蘭紀念大學心理學系的網站。

sentences.english: The headquarters of the organization is located in National Taipei University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 本社社址位於臺北科技大學校區。

sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月將從北京大學畢業，我主修的專業是會計學。

sentences.english: Tung is a justinian of The Justin University of HK.
sentences.chinese: 肥東是香港側田大學的側田學家。

sentences.english: Bill didn't go to college, now that he was apprenticed to a carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾沒有去上大學，因爲他學徒做了木匠。

sentences.english: This paper based on the boiler rebuild project of DaLian Maritime University.
sentences.chinese: 本課題來源於大連海事大學的鍋爐房改建工程。

sentences.english: She and Nancy roomed together at college.
sentences.chinese: 她和南希在大學裏合住一處。

sentences.english: Tian’s mother asked him to go to a local university in their hometown of Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 田川的母親想讓他在家鄉福建讀大學。

sentences.english: I wondered if this was really what post-collegiate life was supposed to be like.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否大學畢業後的生活就真是這個樣子。

sentences.english: He entered Harward University, a university that many people dream of.
sentences.chinese: 他考取了哈佛大學，一所許多人都向往的大學。

sentences.english: He entered Harward University, a university that many people dream of.
sentences.chinese: 他考取了哈佛大學，一所許多人都向往的大學。

sentences.english: Lin Bing was enrolled by University of Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 林冰同學被麻州大學錄取。

sentences.english: SETTING Department of Operation Surgery Union Hospital Affiliated to Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 華中科技大學同濟醫學院附屬協和醫院手外科。

sentences.english: Zhiwu Chen, a professor of finance at Yale, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯大學的金融學教授陳志武也贊同這一看法。

definition: to read a book/to study/to attend school
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
